title: Expand question pool and add answer feedback with sound effects

requirements.summary: Expand question pool with 15-20 questions per category in Persian
acceptanceCriteria: Each category contains at least 15-20 questions
All new questions follow the existing Persian language format
Questions are added to frontend/src/data/questions.ts
New questions maintain the same structure with text, options array, and correctAnswer index

file_operations.description: Expand all four question arrays (flagQuestions, sportsQuestions, intelligenceQuestions, scienceQuestions) to contain 15-20 questions each in Persian, maintaining the existing Question structure with text, options, correctAnswer, and optional imageUrl fields. Ensure variety and avoid repetition across questions.

requirements.summary: Add visual feedback with green for correct and red for incorrect answers
acceptanceCriteria: When correct answer is clicked, the button shows green visual feedback
When incorrect answer is clicked, the button shows red visual feedback
Visual feedback is displayed for at least 1 second before transitioning
Feedback colors are clearly visible against the existing warm orange/yellow theme

file_operations.description: Add state to track the selected answer index and whether it was correct/incorrect. Modify handleAnswer function to set this state and delay the transition to next question or game over by at least 1 second to allow visual feedback display.

Add props to receive selectedAnswer index and isCorrect boolean. Apply conditional className with green background/border for correct answer and red background/border for incorrect answer when selectedAnswer matches the option index. Ensure colors are visible against the warm orange/yellow theme.
Pass selectedAnswer and isCorrect state from useQuizGame hook to QuestionDisplay component to enable visual feedback display.

requirements.summary: Replace background music with exciting, thrilling track
acceptanceCriteria: New background music has an exciting, thrilling energy appropriate for a quiz competition
Music loops continuously throughout all game states
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Music volume is balanced and not overwhelming

file_operations.description: Update the background music Audio reference to use the new generated audio file at frontend/public/assets/generated/quiz-background-music.dim_WIDTHxHEIGHT.mp3. Ensure the audio is set to loop continuously and volume is balanced (e.g., 0.3-0.5). The music should play throughout all game states.

requirements.summary: Add celebratory sound effect for correct answers
acceptanceCriteria: Sound effect plays immediately when correct answer is selected
Sound is celebratory and encouraging in tone
Sound does not interrupt or stop the background music
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Create an Audio instance for the correct answer sound effect using frontend/public/assets/generated/correct-answer-sound.dim_WIDTHxHEIGHT.mp3. Play this sound immediately when handleAnswer is called with the correct answer. Ensure sound volume allows background music to continue playing.

requirements.summary: Add regretful sound effect for incorrect answers
acceptanceCriteria: Sound effect plays immediately when incorrect answer is selected
Sound is regretful and disappointing in tone
Sound does not interrupt or stop the background music
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Create an Audio instance for the incorrect answer sound effect using frontend/public/assets/generated/incorrect-answer-sound.dim_WIDTHxHEIGHT.mp3. Play this sound immediately when handleAnswer is called with an incorrect answer. Ensure sound volume allows background music to continue playing.
